Author: Celendion
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Of course, liquidity is important. And what is important today is compliance with the roadmap. You can see that the project already has its own store, selling glasses with different designs. This is evidence that the team is working. Prototype is being developed. After the announcement of the release of the prototype glasses, with the additional reality, and the implementation of the token ecosystem, the question of liquidity will become more acute. Until that time, we just need to wait for the Q1 2019.

Author: YuryK.
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: This is typical for almost all tokens on the market. The market is now not in the best condition and regardless of the progress in the development of all tokens fell in price

Author: Dimosscolorist
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Exactly. Do not pay much attention to the price today. Each project has suffered a fall in this market. All that interests me is the reduction in volume and the threat of delisting. It will be better, if liquidity is maintained.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hey all, we have a nice update coming out tomorrow on the blog at lucyd.co.  I'd like to remind everyone that since the ICO, we have not only become the first to deliver prescription soundglasses around the world (glasses with bluetooth audio and control), we have also become the first retailer of prescription eyewear that accepts cryptocurrency.  If some of you contributed but were not aware, two weeks ago we did a promo where we were accepting LCD tokens for glasses from Lucyd.co. Since some of you may not have seen this, please email info@lucyd.co if you are interested in participating.  Best, Team Lucyd

Author: Celendion
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: This is all great. You put prescription sound glasses around the world. And you took LCD tokens for glasses from Lucyd.co. But in the first place it goes without saying that selling your points for LCD tokens. And secondly, everyone is looking forward to AR glasses. I know it will be later. But this is what attracted investors to your project. The implementation of this technology.

Author: minhdang2212
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd stands out that way by making AR smart glasses with apps on blockchain. And see how they apply the first in class features to lightweight glasses it has the potential to upend big players like oculus rift and Microsoft’s hololens which remind me of the first mobile phones: giant and clunky. They have a good shot at making this reality and obviously by the looks of it this token sale will accelerate development. They’ll probably end up being sold to FB or Microsoft or Google once they have a working prototype.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Thanks the project is progressing well. We have launched our eshop for advanced eyewear at lucyd.co, and you can already get Rx audio glasses there. Visual smartglasses will be launched through the eshop in the Q1 beta program. We have also begun app development to enhance the overall utility of smartglasses.

Author: scolary23
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World

Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World

Author: Celendion
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: I think that this is logical. If there is no quality product, then the functional of the token will not be interesting to anyone. Therefore, we must wait, first the product, and then the functionality of the ecosystem of the token, as indicated in the white paper.

Author: YuryK.
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: The functionality of the token is likely to be of no interest to anyone in the future. It is quite possible that the team will even abandon it in the future because it can work without it. Investors are only interested in profit, and it does not need a working product and functionality. This requires exchanges and marketing

Author: Celendion
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: However, the token function is posed in white paper. It is clear that the team has no urgent need for this. The interest of investors lies in the functionality of the token. Failure to do so, may affect the reputation from the side community. I hope the team will not joke with this.

Author: Dimosscolorist
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World

Author: guillzini
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: You're right, but that's pretty bad. With all the patents in place and the presented design, it shouldn't have been this long before prototypes were sent out to large early investors.  It's still an interesting idea though, so I'll keep checking back here

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hello. The prototype Lucyd Lens is scheduled for Q1 2019 and this hasn't changed. The development is very private by necessity.  We have however delivered above and beyond our whitepaper, with the lucyd.co eshop. This was never in our original roadmap and is a fully functioning, global shop for innovative eyewear. Not many ICO's deliver a real, unique service only a few months after the funding round closed. It is also a price leader in the online eyewear space, and the FIRST store in the WORLD to accept cryptocurrency for prescription eyewear. We are also currently letting ICO participants purchase glasses with our LCD token.

Author: Celendion
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Yes, here you are right. Not everyone does more than promises. Today, just, many can not cope with their plans. And I visited your store page. There everything looks pretty great. Already there is a large selection, and pretty girls , marketing, I understand everything. However, there is some concern from investors. This is related to the actual functionality of the token in the ecosystem of a Lucyd. I hope this will work as indicated in the white paper. Or maybe you will do more. I noticed that you like to do more.

Author: guillzini
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: I wasn't aware of the store, I'll check that out soon.  I was under the impression that the prototype would be sent out a couple of months after the ICO ended. That's what I could remember reading when signing up for the ICO, but I could be wrong. Looking forward to Q1 2019 then! Thanks for replying!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hi, we've added four team members since the token event.  We are launching an eshop for advanced eyewear in about a month.  We are on schedule to deliver Lucyd Lens beta in Q1.  Keep up to date at lucyd.co/blog or twitter.com/lucydltd

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: What outstanding payments? If you have not received your tokens please contact info@lucyd.co.  We do our best to make sure everyone is satisfied!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We think the two best use cases of blockchain in AR are handsfree token transfers in smartglasses and decentralizing content creation. Lucyd aims to achieve both of these in the next year with the apps and hardware we are currently developing. Basically any transaction from an AR device could use our token, and we aim to make this possible.  As more token uses in smartglasses become apparent, we will seek to develop those as well.

Author: tendy263
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Augmented reality (AR) technology, increasingly familiar in games like Pokémon Go or Snapchat face filters, superimposes digital images on a phone-screen view of the real world to deliver a composite of the two. Accessing the AR experience isn’t limited by the expense or awkwardness of additional equipment that restricts more immersive virtual reality (VR) technologies. All you need for AR is a decent smartphone with a camera.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Harrison Gross: ⭐️UPDATE APRIL 18TH  Gas has been sent to all standard  accounts. PM @harrisongross if you did not receive gas or have any other issues. Please only email info@lucyd.co if you are sending documents. Support reqs generally resolved in 24-48 hrs.  TOKENS ARE OUT. GO TO LCD.LUCYD.CO AND GO TO WALLET TAB TO DOWNLOAD KEYSTORE FILE TO ACCESS LCD VIA MYETHERWALLET.COM. Tutorial linked above.  To “Add Custom Token”: Contract address is 0x9a4059c1cf329a017e0ee1337c503137Fd9463b2 18 decimals Gas limit 58000  If you are American, or did not receive your tokens for any other reason (eg incomplete KYC) pm @harrisongross.  Referral tokens are being sent out. PM @harrisongross with Lucyd wallet ID and desired ERC20-compatible deposit address.  LCD is currently trading on IDEX https://idex.market/eth/lcd and the Lykke exchange app for ios/android!  Additionally, we will be on the Nebula.exchange, a Singaporean platform, starting April 30th. Blockbid.com.au, an Australian exchange, is confirmed for June. We are working on more exchanges to give our community as many options as possible. You can recommend exchanges here and if they are reasonable we will apply!  TOTAL SUPPLY IS 91.6M LCD, CIRCULATING SUPPLY IS ABOUT 44M. Approximate breakdown of current tokens: 8m burned, 1m bounty, 30m company/blockchain dev (locked 6 months), 10m team (locked 12 months), 5m affiliates, 5m partners and vendors, 35m sold in ICO (counting bonuses)  💠Major announcements coming in next few weeks about Lucyd’s overall progress. We are on schedule to produce the beta smartglass Q1 2019. Eligible accounts will be contacted, you don’t need to keep your LCD in Lucyd-issued wallet. You can also sell and repurchas it.💠  Thanks #lucydfam!!  Code: t.me/lucyd_en

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: The token will have a number of critical utilities on our platform.  It enables a borderless financial network in our AR smartglass, connecting users and developers all over the world with easy transactions in AR. We are also using it to power the content marketplace (app store) for our smartglass, with all purchases made in LCD tokens, and high quality developers and network supporters automatically mining tokens for their contributions. Since Lucyd Lens will be a bluetooth peripheral, tokenizing the content is necessary to allow developers to keep more traditional app revenue as well (cash payments would be subject to fees from Apple/Google Play).

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We have begun R&D and are on schedule with the roadmap (lucyd.co/roadmap)  Tokens release this week with a delay for bounty and affiliate tokens.  Seeking listing on exchanges, so far confirmed on Nebula and Blockbid.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: You will be able to buy our hardware with any currency, including USD and BTC. But we are trying to power our AR content marketplace wholly on the LCD token, to let developers keep more traditional app revenue and improve the convenience and security. We plan to make it extremely easy to acquire and liquidate LCD tokens as needed, completely within the smartglass interface. We see the true potential of LCD bridging value in the real world with that in the AR world, letting users join our platform and purchase content anonymously, and giving more control over content to the community with a token-based ratings system for apps and media.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Both! We are developing our own software, mainly focusing on the operating system/interface. We have signed 12 official partners, 10 of which are AR app developers who we will be working closely with to deliver great content.  Additionally, we are developing a decentralized app marketplace for Lucyd Lens which will enable anyone to start creating and sharing AR content, easily and freely.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We have begun R&D and are on track to release our beta in Q1 2019. After a few months of beta testing we should be ready for commercial release!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We have had a series of audits both on the whitepaper (by ICOrating) and on our smart contract (by Backes SRT GmbH). Furthermore, as part of a public UK company Tekcapital, Lucyd's finances are being fully audited by KPMG LLP.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Our telegram group t.me/lucyd_en is best place to stay connected, there we send push notes for most critical updates. Twitter.com/lucydltd and lucyd.co/blog are also good info points.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Check twitter and telegram (t/me/lucyd_en) for real time updates.  We have the R&D team fully engaged and are on track to meet the goals in lucyd.co/roadmap.  This month we have been very busy with token distribution (happening this week), bonuses and refunds, so the news flow has a been a little slow, apologies!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Apologies for this, because of the large number of unauthorized US residents joining the ICO, we had to shore back our funds raised amount.  We will actually be burning more tokens because of this so it should have a positive impact on the price--not to mention the refunded Americans have a expressed a desire to recoup their tokens on exchanges, which should have a positive effect as well.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We have a revenue model based on a few things: sales of smartglass hardware, commissions based on AR content sold on the tokenized app store we're developing, and network fees on use of the LCD token.  You can read a full breakdown of Lucyd's business model in the whitepaper on lucyd.co.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We are in development, on track for the beta in Q1 2019. We are also seeking listing on token exchanges and seeking new development partners.

We are also developing the Lucyd optics eshop which will be the main distribution channel for our products, as well as an AR app marketplace powered by the LCD token. Furthermore, we are currently seeking listing on token exchanges (2 small ones confirmed thus far)

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We have a few: 1. Develop user-friednly smartglasses for beta release Q1 2019 2. Improve liquidity of the LCD token by listing on as many exchanges as possible 3. Develop our distribution channel for the hardware, in the form of an optics e-shop that will let you purchase both normal and smartglasses with LCD tokens and other currencies.

Author: AntonAnton
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Participated in the Twitter campaign from 02/01/2018 until the end of the bounty, that is about 13-14 weeks. As a result, for participation in Twitter-bounty, I was credited with 50 steaks. Although, taking into account the fact that 5 steaks were used for each week, about 65-70 steaks should be cooked in this. A similar situation with the charging of steaks for participation in the Facebook campaign. Attending it from 05/01/2018 until the end of the bounty. That is also about 13-14 weeks. During the time of participation he fulfilled all the conditions on time. In the end, I was credited with 45 steaks, although a simple calculation shows that there should be about 65-70 steaks. I ask you to count the accrued steaks. The number in the Twitter table is 1196, on the Facebook table is 379. Thank you.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: So far we have raised over $ 5.4 million. The goals of the Lucyd token event are to collect the funding needed to develop a pre-production prototype of Lucyd Lens, as well as to create the Lucyd Lab blockchain. Lucyd Lab will drive 3rd party native app development and user engagement with LCD token rewards, which can be used to purchase AR products from Lucyd, and traded on token exchanges. We will soon start the production of the first prototype Beta Lens. It will be available in different styles and colors once they are out for the mass market.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: All tokens will be delivered after the ICO (February 28th). All major currencies accepted including Ethereum, Bitcoin, Litecoin & Bitcoin Cash. LCD will become transferable to other wallets and exchanges after ICO end, and bonus tokens will issued at this time as well. If you contribute enough for a Lens preorder, you must retain 5,000 LCD to exchange for it when available. LCD bonus rungs are as follows (equivalent amounts in crypto get same bonus): •   $600 and up: 10% extra LCD. •   $1200 and up: 10% extra LCD and automatic, fully paid preorder of a beta Lucyd Lens. •   $3000 and up: 15% extra LCD and Lens preorder. •   $6000 and up: 20% extra LCD and Lens preorder. •   $9000 and up: 25% extra LCD and Lens preorder. •   $18000 and up: 35% extra LCD and Lens preorder.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Our softcap is $ 1.5 million. We have already reached it and have raised over $5.4 million up to date. The goals of the Lucyd token event are to collect the funding needed to develop a pre-production prototype of Lucyd Lens, as well as to create the Lucyd Lab blockchain. Lucyd Lab will drive 3rd party native app development and user engagement with LCD token rewards, which can be used to purchase AR products from Lucyd, and traded on token exchanges. We will soon start the production of the first prototype Beta Lens. It will be available in different styles and colors once they are out for the mass market.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Here we go https://www.lucyd.co/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/roadmap-new-web.png

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd is releasing 50 mln LCD tokens in the total sale. The regular sale LCD token will be valued at $.25 USD=1 LCD and has started on Oct 31st. The regular sale will last until February 28th, 2018. LCD has several functions. Its initial use is to fund the development of the Lucyd Lens prototype. LCD tokens have lot of functions. It will facilitate rapid peer-to-peer transactions in the Lucyd AR world, and is used to organically motivate user and developer engagement with Lucyd Lens. It accomplishes this through the Lucyd Lab blockchain, on which new AR content & apps are registered. Blocks then release LCD to developers based on user ratings of their content, and to users based on their feedback to the developer community, and participation in ads and promotions. LCD can be used to purchase AR products from Lucyd and other developers, as well as bought and sold on token exchanges.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd’s 13 AR patents enable thin micro displays for a richly textured, dynamically layered AR experience, unlike existing smartglasses that use a protruding external display. This tech also enables Lucyd Lens to be the first smartglass that is compatible with prescription lenses, and looks like a normal pair of glasses. As a result we envision Lucyd Lens to be available in a wide range of frame styles for men, women and children. Lucyd also has an advanced patent for real-world object detection, allowing its AR interface to more smoothly intermingle digital content with the real world.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd has assembled a team of experts and recognized innovators in the optics, AR and crypto fields. Professor Janick Rolland, Ph.D., Science Advisor and Optics Expert at Lucyd, is one of the foremost optics innovators in the world. Director of the NSF Center for Freeform Optics, U. of Rochester. Other leading science advisrors in optics & AR are Mikhail Gutin, Ph.D. (Dr. Mikhail is president of Applied Science Innovations, Inc. Optics Innovator & Recipient of R&D 100 award); Leo Baldwin, M.S.(Leo works at Amazon Computer Vision Group and previously served as principal engineer at Amazon Go and was a Fellow at GoPro); Donna Waters, M.S. (Donna is an optical designer with 20 years of experience. President, Proof of Concept Optical Engineering. Previously at Micron Technologies); and professor Yiorgos Kostoulas, Ph.D. (Dr. Kostoulas is an optics expert and Associate Professor, Division of General Engineering, Vanderbilt University). Lucyd Lens will be built on a blueprint of 13 related patents developed by world-class optics experts at the University of Central Florida. These patents were exclusively licensed by Lucyd. We believe that the innovative technology and an all-star team enables critical features for next-gen AR glasses, which are missing from currently available products. In addition, our CEO Dr. Clifford Gross has an an executive with leadership experience in academia and commercial enterprises. He is an author of four books and is a named inventor on 19 issued patents. Cliff has founded three listed companies, in which he served as CEO and Chairman. Currently he is CEO of Tekcapital plc. Previously, he served as CEO of Innovacorp, a provincial venture capital fund in Nova Scotia, was a Director of the graduate program in biomechanics and ergonomics at New York University, Chairman of the Nelson Rockefeller Department of Biomechanics at the New York Institute of Technology, and research professor at the University of South Florida.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Don’t worry about privacy in a world where everyone is wearing smartglasses. We care about making sure everyone feels safe around our product. Lucyd Lens will only show public, opted-in information of other Lens users whilein “Nav Mode,” the interface mode when you are walking around town. To clarify, the Lens only shows public profiles of other Lens wearers who have opted-in to sharing them. The Lens will also have a red LED on the front face by the camera, which must be on at all times whenever a photo or video capture app is open. All 3rd party apps must be approved by Lucyd, and meet stringent health and privacy measures to make sure Lens is useful and safe for everyone.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd is releasing 50 mln LCD tokens in the total sale. The regular sale LCD token will be valued at $.25 USD=1 LCD and has started on Oct 31st. The regular sale will last until February 28th, 2018. LCD has several functions. Its initial use is to fund the development of the Lucyd Lens prototype. LCD tokens have lot of functions. It will facilitate rapid peer-to-peer transactions in the Lucyd AR world, and is used to organically motivate user and developer engagement with Lucyd Lens. It accomplishes this through the Lucyd Lab blockchain, on which new AR content & apps are registered. Blocks then release LCD to developers based on user ratings of their content, and to users based on their feedback to the developer community, and participation in ads and promotions. LCD can be used to purchase AR products from Lucyd and other developers, as well as bought and sold on token exchanges.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd has assembled a team of experts and recognized innovators in the optics, AR and crypto fields. Professor Janick Rolland, Ph.D., Science Advisor and Optics Expert at Lucyd, is one of the foremost optics innovators in the world. Director of the NSF Center for Freeform Optics, U. of Rochester. Other leading science advisrors in optics & AR are Mikhail Gutin, Ph.D. (Dr. Mikhail is president of Applied Science Innovations, Inc. Optics Innovator & Recipient of R&D 100 award); Leo Baldwin, M.S.(Leo works at Amazon Computer Vision Group and previously served as principal engineer at Amazon Go and was a Fellow at GoPro); Donna Waters, M.S. (Donna is an optical designer with 20 years of experience. President, Proof of Concept Optical Engineering. Previously at Micron Technologies); and professor Yiorgos Kostoulas, Ph.D. (Dr. Kostoulas is an optics expert and Associate Professor, Division of General Engineering, Vanderbilt University). Lucyd Lens will be built on a blueprint of 13 related patents developed by world-class optics experts at the University of Central Florida. These patents were exclusively licensed by Lucyd. We believe that the innovative technology and an all-star team enables critical features for next-gen AR glasses, which are missing from currently available products.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We stand out from other existing smartglasses like Google Glass or Hololens because our tech is truly next-generation. Lucyd’s 13 AR patents enable thin micro displays for a richly textured, dynamically layered AR experience, unlike existing smartglasses that use a protruding external display. This tech also enables Lucyd Lens to be the first smartglass that is compatible with prescription lenses, and looks like a normal pair of glasses. As a result we envision Lucyd Lens to be available in a wide range of frame styles for men, women and children. Lucyd also has an advanced patent for real-world object detection, allowing its AR interface to more smoothly intermingle digital content with the real world.

No need to wait when all of the information is right there..  Just sayin..  Quote from: Monkey_Thinker on February 16, 2018, 10:47:07 AM Hm. How will I get the part of the profit? In fiat or crypto? Or in tokens of ico that you invest in? Could you please explain, I’m new to crypto  Your question makes no sense so if you're really that new to crypto, perhaps you should not be investing anywhere until you know what you're doing.  Like any ICO, you'd invest your crypto (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, what have you) and exchange that for Lucyd's LCD tokens (also a crypto). In time, they appreciate in value. If you want to then sell them for fiat when you're in profit, that's your choice.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd is releasing 50 mln LCD tokens in the total sale. The regular sale LCD token will be valued at $.25 USD=1 LCD. All tokens will be delivered after the ICO (February 28th). All major currencies accepted including Ethereum, Bitcoin, Litecoin & Bitcoin Cash. LCD will become transferable to other wallets after ICO end, and bonus tokens will issued at this time as well. If you contribute enough for a Lens preorder, you must retain 5,000 LCD to exchange for it when available. LCD bonus rungs are as follows (equivalent amounts in crypto get same bonus): •   $600 and up: 10% extra LCD. •   $1200 and up: 10% extra LCD and automatic, fully paid preorder of a beta Lucyd Lens. •   $3000 and up: 15% extra LCD and Lens preorder. •   $6000 and up: 20% extra LCD and Lens preorder. •   $9000 and up: 25% extra LCD and Lens preorder. •   $18000 and up: 35% extra LCD and Lens preorder.  Please follow the link if you'd like to contribute https://lcd.lucyd.co/

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd has a clear strategy for developing our technology into a hardware prototype. We are employing incremental funding methods to gather only what is needed for each stage of business development. The first 500 LCD purchasers over $1200 automatically reserve a fully paid Beta Lucyd Lens, releasing Q1 2019, several months before the production model. All major currencies accepted including Ethereum, Bitcoin, Litecoin & Bitcoin Cash. LCD will become transferable to other wallets and exchanges after ICO end, and bonus tokens will issued at this time as well. For more information please visit our website https://www.lucyd.co/

LCD bonus rungs are as follows (equivalent amounts in crypto get same bonus): •   $600 and up: 10% extra LCD. •   $1200 and up: 10% extra LCD and automatic, fully paid preorder of a beta Lucyd Lens. •   $3000 and up: 15% extra LCD and Lens preorder. •   $6000 and up: 20% extra LCD and Lens preorder. •   $9000 and up: 25% extra LCD and Lens preorder. •   $18000 and up: 35% extra LCD and Lens preorder. Top 50 donors will be named Lucyd Legends, receive a limited platinum-colored Lucyd Lens, a 3-year extended warranty, and 40% extra LCD.

Author: Artemsv
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: A Brief History Of Augmented Reality https://medium.com/@LUCYDLTD/a-brief-history-of-augmented-reality-234f4ab8ac05    If we take a look at the past, we can see that the first working AR system that truly created a full experience came about in the early 90s. This was known as the infamous Virtual Fixtures system made for the United States Air Force back in 1992.  Aside from that, Augmented Reality was primarily used in entertainment and gaming. That said, as technology advances (both hardware and software), other industries are joining in.  Now that mobile phones have proliferated every facet of life, it’s common for people to claim that VR/AR is the next frontier. Augmented Reality hardware has been virtually non-existent (no pun intended) for the past several years.  The only thing that’s come close has been the short-lived Google Glass.  A hugely unpopular product, Google Glass had the unfortunate luck of being both ahead of its time and also severely under-supported by Google. While it had tremendous potential, it wasn’t until the advent of blockchain technology that the prospect of AR glasses became an attractive proposition again.  Lucyd’s glasses act also as a wallet, enabling users to send and receive transactions — much like other cryptocurrency wallets.  With 75% of smartphone users requiring prescription eyewear, the market for Augmented Reality eyewear is huge. While we don’t expect wearable tech to completely replace smartphones, we are confident that the every-day usability of eyeglasses combined with the advantages of Augmented Reality will create a busy marketplace for both developers and users.

Author: filsid
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: How Smart Glasses Could Solve the Asymmetric Information Dilemma  Whether it’s buying a used car, television, or a cup of coffee, one of the most timeless problems faced by consumers is — “How do I know what I’m getting for what I paid for?”  More specifically, this issue is what’s referred to by academics and economists as Asymmetric Information. The basic issue as it relates to any transaction of goods, is that there’s an imperfect balance of information. The seller of a used car, for example, knows a lot more about the history of the vehicle than the buyer — putting the buyer at a disadvantage in most cases.  On the flip side, the asymmetric information dilemma can also work against sellers. Consumers assume that high-priced items are a rip-off because sellers are keeping key information from them, and shy away from buying because they don’t think they’ll receive fair value.  And while technology has taken a stab at solving the asymmetric information problem — think of websites like Carfax or Zillow — there’s on emerging technology that has the potential to be a real game-changer for both buyers and sellers: Augmented Reality (AR).  https://medium.com/@LUCYDLTD/how-smart-glasses-could-solve-the-asymmetric-information-dilemma-e360fb0da004

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: There is at least 4-5 reasons.  Blockchain’s promise is the decentralization of trust, potentially enabling value exchange without intermediaries in a democratized ecosystem. It provides the potential for financial transactions to be verified and cleared without the need for a trusted third party sitting between market participants. Removing intermediaries reduces costs and complexity and should enhance security, while also enabling a freer exchange of value and services. Blockchain offers a number of exciting opportunities, including secure peer to peer transactions. In blockchain we saw the incredible potential to develop the Lucyd platform, through our token generation event, where we will launch our AR utility token called LCD. It also provides enhanced functionality for an AR content ecosystem, which through the Lucyd Lab blockchain can grow rapidly and be community-regulated. Our blockchain will let developers mine new LCD by creating quality content, with more LCD being released as the content gets more positive ratings. Downrated content can be automatically removed from the ecosystem, and developers can gain influence and prominence in the ecosystem by continually creating well-rated content. LCD has a number of vital functions in the Lucyd platform. It will allow highly secure, rapid, P2P transactions on the Lucyd network. For example, you could send LCD to your colleague simply by speaking the command in-Lens. By having both the medium of access, and the hardware wallet itself in a single unit, we believe highly secure and convenient cryptocurrency transactions will be possible. By letting developers mine tokens with quality content, and rewarding users for community-building actions, we believe our AR platform can grow much faster with the blockchain than traditional app ecosystems. LCD can be used for purchases of smartglasses, Lucyd native content and in-lens transactions, creating a decentralized micro-economy around our hardware platform. A token generation event is much faster than traditional fundraising methods, which is especially important in the rapidly-advancing AR space. A final reason for using a token generation event to raise contributions for development of our smartglasses, is that the typical token purchasers are tech-savvy and more likely to be an early adopter of our next-gen smartglasses.

Author: Jekwizor
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Australian Winery Creates Wine Labels That Use Augmented Reality To Talk To Customers    As the world begins to wake up to the potential of Augmented Reality, we are starting to see more and more creative applications of this new technology in various industries.  One such application comes from Treasury Wine Estates. Currently using a smartphone app, the new technology allows consumers to hold their phones up to the wine label and see photos come to life, Harry Potter-style.  While little more than a gimmick to sell wine, the implications for this new technology are huge. Imagine being able to embed messages in every day objects, only able to be unlocked by a certain AR code.  https://medium.com/@LUCYDLTD/australian-winery-creates-wine-labels-that-use-augmented-reality-to-talk-to-customers-58ee703ac637

Author: alexvilis
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd: Seeing Augmented Reality Through the Blockchain Explore  When considering augmented reality (AR) as an emerging technology, smartglasses are currently top-of-mind. Smartglasses are eyewear that transmit real-time information into a users field of vision. Despite promising developments on this front, tech giants like Apple, Google and Oculus have yet to be successful in their efforts to create a version for mainstream consumers. Though Google Glass has garnered the most attention in this space, the current product has many drawbacks (short battery life, privacy issues and high price).  However, the smartglasses concept delivers promising possibilities by allowing users to transfer everyday information to the internet from a comfortable, wearable, hands-free device experience.  One company that intends to create a new normal for the smartglasses movement is Lucyd. Lucyd is an emerging technology startup that facilitates the development of augmented reality mobile applications and wearable smart products. Founded in 2017, Lucyd is creating next generation augmented reality smartglasses with the added twist of using a decentralized platform for its alternative reality (AR) platform and app marketplace.  Lucyd is targeting those seeking to access information more easily — essentially, smartphone users. With an estimated 75 percent of the world’s population needing corrective lenses of some type, Lucyd Lens aspires to make ordinary glasses redundant.  Lucyd’s grand vision is to untether users from the prevailing hassle of having to glance away from the outside world to access online information, whether it be through a mobile phone, computer or some other device.  Wearers of Lucyd smartglasses can switch between ordinary glasses or a broad spectrum of AR applications to complete different tasks.  https://bitcoinmagazine.com/articles/lucyd-seeing-augmented-reality-through-blockchain/

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd Lens will be safe to use. Also, you can always switch to a normal mode, without AR navigation. In terms of competition, we stand out from other existing smartglasses like Google Glass or Hololens because our tech is truly next-generation. Lucyd’s 13 AR patents enable thin micro displays for a richly textured, dynamically layered AR experience, unlike existing smartglasses that use a protruding external display. This tech also enables Lucyd Lens to be the first smartglass that is compatible with prescription lenses, and looks like a normal pair of glasses. As a result we envision Lucyd Lens to be available in a wide range of frame styles for men, women and children. Lucyd also has an advanced patent for real-world object detection, allowing its AR interface to more smoothly intermingle digital content with the real world.

Body: We envision that our smartglasses will be available to purchase to the mass market

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: LCD has several functions. Its initial use is to fund the development of the Lucyd Lens prototype. LCD will also facilitate rapid peer-to-peer transactions in the Lucyd AR world, and is used to organically motivate user and developer engagement with Lucyd Lens. It accomplishes this through the Lucyd Lab blockchain, on which new AR content & apps are registered. Blocks then release LCD to developers based on user ratings of their content, and to users based on their feedback to the developer community, and participation in ads and promotions. LCD can be used to purchase AR products from Lucyd and other developers, as well as bought and sold on token exchanges.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: LCD token has several functions. Its initial use is to fund the development of the Lucyd Lens prototype. LCD will also facilitate rapid peer-to-peer transactions in the Lucyd AR world, and is used to organically motivate user and developer engagement with Lucyd Lens. It accomplishes this through the Lucyd Lab blockchain, on which new AR content & apps are registered. Blocks then release LCD to developers based on user ratings of their content, and to users based on their feedback to the developer community, and participation in ads and promotions. LCD can be used to purchase AR products from Lucyd and other developers, as well as bought and sold on token exchanges.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd is very different from existing AR solutions because our tech is truly next-generation. Lucyd’s 13 AR patents enable thin micro displays for a richly textured, dynamically layered AR experience, unlike existing smartglasses that use a protruding external display. This tech also enables Lucyd Lens to be the first smartglass that is compatible with prescription lenses, and looks like a normal pair of glasses. As a result we envision Lucyd Lens to be available in a wide range of frame styles for men, women and children. Lucyd also has an advanced patent for real-world object detection, allowing its AR interface to more smoothly intermingle digital content with the real world.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: No. Purchasing 5000 LCD ($1150 with 10% bonus) by the end of the ICO is enough to reserve a beta Lucyd Lens. You must retain at least 5000 LCD to exchange for the Lens in Q1 2019 when available. LCD will become tradeable for BTC on the Blockbid exchange in March.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hello yes it's completely AR. AR superimposes computer graphics and text on top of your natural vision and interacts with real objects in real life. VR is 100% simulation.  We think AR is the future because it is the next step in how we view digital information - it needs to interact with real life, where you dont have to look on your smartphone.

Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hey, check our roadmap on our website https://www.lucyd.co/. Lucyd has a clear strategy for developing our technology into a hardware prototype. We are employing incremental funding methods to gather only what is needed for each stage of business development. The first 500 LCD purchasers over $1200 automatically reserve a fully paid Beta Lucyd Lens, releasing Q1 2019, several moths before the production model.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Thank you for supporting us! We appreciate each one of the Lucyd dreamers' contribution

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd is very different from existing AR solutions because our tech is truly next-generation. Lucyd’s 13 AR patents enable thin micro displays for a richly textured, dynamically layered AR experience, unlike existing smartglasses that use a protruding external display. This tech also enables Lucyd Lens to be the first smartglass that is compatible with prescription lenses, and looks like a normal pair of glasses. As a result we envision Lucyd Lens to be available in a wide range of frame styles for men, women and children. Lucyd also has an advanced patent for real-world object detection, allowing its AR interface to more smoothly intermingle digital content with the real world.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd is releasing 50 mln LCD tokens in the total sale. The regular sale LCD token will be valued at $.25 USD=1 LCD and has started on Oct 31st. The regular sale will last until February 28th, 2018.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: . Lucyd is an augmented reality startup developing ergonomic, prescription-ready, next-gen smartglasses, and a blockchain app store that will make it easy to create, share and experience new AR content. We have a team of 7 Ph.D. scientists in optics and have exclusively licensed 13 patents from University of Central Florida. Our ICO has started in October 2017 and will run till 28 February 2018. So far we have reached our softcap and sold over 9 million LCD tokens, which equal to $3.5 million. If you want to reserve your glasses you can still do it before our ICO ends. Purchasing 5000 LCD ($1150 with 10% bonus) by the end of the ICO is enough to reserve a beta Lucyd Lens. You must retain at least 5000 LCD to exchange for the Lens in Q1 2019 when available. LCD will become tradeable for BTC on the Blockbid exchange in March. Fore more info visit https://www.lucyd.co/

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd has already formed strategic alliances with top software developer companies including: Gravity Jack, Kagiso Interactive, Inde, Rivetz, Zco corporation, Current, Credencys & Roar. Check our blog for more info https://www.lucyd.co/blog/

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Yes! So far we have attended Blockchain Expo North America, Cryptocurrency World Expo, LATAM Bitocin & Blockchain Conference, CoinAgenda Summit, World Crypto Economic Forum, The North American Bitcoin Conference, Blockchain Week London, ICO London & Amsterdam, and d10e Cayman Islands. There is 1 more upcoming conference left, The Blockchain Event Fort Lauderdale happening on February 15-16th, if you are around come and meet us!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd is releasing 50 mln LCD tokens in the total sale. The regular sale LCD token will be valued at $.25 USD=1 LCD and has started on Oct 31st. The regular sale will last until February 28th, 2018. LCD has several functions. Its initial use is to fund the development of the Lucyd Lens prototype. LCD tokens have lot of functions. It will also facilitate rapid peer-to-peer transactions in the Lucyd AR world, and is used to organically motivate user and developer engagement with Lucyd Lens. It accomplishes this through the Lucyd Lab blockchain, on which new AR content & apps are registered. Blocks then release LCD to developers based on user ratings of their content, and to users based on their feedback to the developer community, and participation in ads and promotions. LCD can be used to purchase AR products from Lucyd and other developers, as well as bought and sold on token exchanges.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hello, Lucyd doesn't have a direct competitor. But some of the big tech companies that tried to produce smartglasses are: GoogleGlass/Hololens. We get this question often times and the answer is that Lucyd is very different from existing AR solutions because our tech is truly next-generation. Our 13 AR patents enable thin micro displays for a richly textured, dynamically layered AR experience, unlike existing smartglasses that use a protruding external display. This tech also enables Lucyd Lens to be the first smartglass that is compatible with prescription lenses, and looks like a normal pair of glasses. As a result we envision Lucyd Lens to be available in a wide range of frame styles for men, women and children. Lucyd also has an advanced patent for real-world object detection, allowing its AR interface to more smoothly intermingle digital content with the real world.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: LCD token has several functions. Its initial use is to fund the development of the Lucyd Lens prototype. LCD will also facilitate rapid peer-to-peer transactions in the Lucyd AR world, and is used to organically motivate user and developer engagement with Lucyd Lens. It accomplishes this through the Lucyd Lab blockchain, on which new AR content & apps are registered. Blocks then release LCD to developers based on user ratings of their content, and to users based on their feedback to the developer community, and participation in ads and promotions. LCD can be used to purchase AR products from Lucyd and other developers, as well as bought and sold on token exchanges. Purchasing 5000 LCD ($1150 with 10% bonus) by the end of the ICO is enough to reserve a beta Lucyd Lens. You must retain at least 5000 LCD to exchange for the Lens in Q1 2019 when available. LCD will become tradeable for BTC on the Blockbid exchange in March. Hope this helps

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Thank you for your support! We have just hit our soft cap funding goal, with about $2.5 million raised! Once our ICO ends (28 February, 2018), we will start developing a pre-production prototype of Lucyd Lens, as well as to create the Lucyd Lab blockchain. So stay tuned on updates!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hey, good question! There have been lots of companies that tried to produce smartglasses but they have failed (like GoogleGlass and Hololens). Most smartglasses that have ever been marketed out there looks very bulky and uncomfortable. Lucyd is very different from existing AR solutions because our tech is truly next-generation. Lucyd’s 13 AR patents enable thin micro displays for a richly textured, dynamically layered AR experience, unlike existing smartglasses that use a protruding external display. This tech also enables Lucyd Lens to be the first smartglass that is compatible with prescription lenses, and looks like a normal pair of glasses. As a result we envision Lucyd Lens to be available in a wide range of frame styles for men, women and children. Lucyd also has an advanced patent for real-world object detection, allowing its AR interface to more smoothly intermingle digital content with the real world.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We will start working on the first prototype development, the Beta Lens. Thus far the optical system and front-end UX only are in development, we are evaluating hardware solutions now. But the Lens will start as a smartphone periphery, harnessing it for processing power and data signal. Smartphone is the motherboard, Lens is simply the monitor and “cursor,” or input device, so the actual on-board computing power of the Lens will be limited to keep it light, stylish and comfortable.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hello, please read the analysis of Lucyd's AR technology by Dr. Yiorgos Kostoulas https://www.lucyd.co/2017/12/22/DRKOSTOULAS/ and Scientific Analysis of Lucyd Patents by Lucyd Optics Lead, Dr. Kayat <https://www.lucyd.co/2017/10/31/SCIENTIFIC-ANALYSIS-OF-LUCYD-PATENTS-BY-LUCYD-OPTICS-LEAD-DR-KAYAT/>. In addition, you will be able to use the Lens like normal glasses, with no AR at any time while using Lens, you can simply say “Dream Deferred” (or a custom phrase) to disengage the AR and return to natural sight. We are also considering adding two additional features where you can also snap near the Lens or blink for three seconds to engage/disengage the AR interface.

Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World

We have just hit our soft cap funding goal, with about $2.5 million raised, our goal is to reach the hardcap, $10 million. We will start the pre prototype production after the ICO ends. Stay tuned!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: It's not a binary world - if it was, there would have never been successful startups. Not saying we will be like them, but for example Google was started in garage with one pending patent when YAhoo was multibillion dollar company.  Most players in AR have been focusing on creating entertaining, but mostly geeky looking, indoor applicable devices mostly. And those have some great uses and fun applications. But we see our glasses as not necessarily a consumer electronics gadget, but next level glasses. Our technology focuses on improving ergonomics of smartglasses, because any mass market product for consumers need to be ergonomic. And ergonomics of a product like smartglasses is mostly derived from optics behind it. Most of our patents are in advanced optics, between free form optics, light guide, eye tracking etc.This technology has been worked on for many years at a leading advanced optics research center in the U.S. My wish for everyone would be to read the article by Dr. Kostoulas about where our technology fits on the competitive landscape: https://www.lucyd.co/technology/  We focus on improving certain aspects of currrently available AR displays that prevented it from going mainstream: For example, current devices have up to 30 degrees field of view, our tech enables up to 120 degrees, so that it feels like natural eye view and doesnt cause eye strain. iI also miniaturizes optics elements needed to make lenses and frames smaller, lighter, and looking more like normal glasses. It is prescription ready. It improves real object detection accuracy. All very important aspects from the standpoint of people being actually able to wear glasses in every day situations

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We have 7 Ph.D.s on the team, with leading optics and AR scientists in the U.S. These are some of the most skilled experts in the field!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: We are developing glasses that are light weight, have a wider field of view and correct more ergonomics aspects that reduce eye strain amongst others.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hello, user friendly smartglasses can make just about any daily task more efficient. Imagine being able to pull information from the web without using your hands, and being able to pull information on things you are seeing in the real world just by looking at them. Additionally, you will be able to do many computing and mobile phone tasks in a much larger, heads-up HD display, all housed in a compact pair of prescription-ready glasses.  Our blockchain is going to help self-regulate the software marketplace for our platform too.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hello, even the Gen 1 Lucyd Lens will be able to do just about anything your smartphone does, with added AR graphics and handsfree controls such as voice recognition.  As a bluetooth peripheral to smartphones, Lucyd Lens will be porting your phone's operating system into AR. Imagine lifting your phone screen into a large heads up display, controlled by your voice and eventually your fingers or eyes in later versions.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: LCD is the building block of our decentralized marketplace. It's necessary to turn control of the ecosystem over to the community, and to let users enjoy the platform without releasing sensitive personal and financial information. Owning more tokens will give you benefits and promotion opportunities in our marketplace to expose your content to a wider audience. It also gives you more influence in rating other's content, which helps determine how heavily their content is featured (or how quickly it is removed) in the marketplace.  It's also going to help the Lens connect with other projects running on ERC20 tokens, since they are highly compatible.

Author: crevbi
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: LUCYD LAB BLOCKCHAIN BREAKDOWN  One of the most common questions put to Lucyd is why we need a blockchain. There are a lot of useful applications on our AR platform, but the answer is actually straightforward.    In a similar fashion to the Internet connecting people and ideas from all over the world, blockchain can enhance, spread and protect data by putting it on a peer-to-peer, decentralized network. A network or marketplace operates more smoothly and fruitfully when it is assuredly fair, with a transparent authority shared by the userbase. At Lucyd, we recognize that a mainstream AR platform will be bigger than any one idea, bigger than any one company. So we are trying to open the software marketplace for our platform to the developers of the world, to be built, experienced and controlled by the community. By using blockchain to democratize the content creation and moderation process, we are attempting to build a self-sufficient ecosystem, which can grow much faster than traditional app stores. The Lucyd Lab blockchain will organically promote well-received apps and media, while systematically deleting harmful or useless content, all while letting developers keep more of their app revenue. With the Lab, we can lay the foundation for a smartglass that combines ergonomic, next-gen hardware with an active and engaged developer community.  To improve processing speed and economic utility, functions on a blockchain typically operate on peer-to-peer cryptocurrency tokens. These tokens are used to store monetary value in the network, with more tokens roughly equating to a greater “stake” of ownership in the network. Tokens are typically rewarded to “miners” and server owners who supply computing power to operate the blockchain. In the case of Lucyd Lab, LCD tokens are mined by developers and users for community-building efforts, as well as by sharing storage of app and content data. Developers can mine LCD by creating positively rated content, and users can mine LCD by participating in reviews, bounties, referrals and promotional content. LCD can be used to purchase content from the network, hardware from Lucyd, cashed out on token exchanges, or sent in peer-to-peer transactions. We envision all utilities of the token, and all developer and user activity, taking place entirely within the AR interface of Lucyd Lens.  https://www.lucyd.co/2018/01/24/blockchain/

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: That's only a beginning.  The token has several core functions mentioned on the site and elsewhere in the whitepaper (the referenced section is about Lucyd business initiatives). Token functionality is not a perfect mirror of Lucyd projected revenue streams—network fees on LCD transactions and transfers is just one source of revenue. LCD tokens have these prime uses: •   Encourages app development and user engagement with Lucyd Lens by rewarding developers and users for certain actions with LCD tokens. Developers will get LCD based on user ratings, which are submitted to a block corresponding to their content on the Lucyd Lab blockchain. This additional merit-based bonus atop traditional app revenue will motive 3rd party development. •   Users get LCD for basic actions like reviews, app referrals and ad participation. •   Enables a user experience untethered to existing platforms and financial systems, grounded only in the Lucyd smartphone companion app and Lucyd Lab blockchain. LCD enables in-Lens purchases of Lucyd hardware and Lucyd-native apps and media, without a bank account. In-Lens downloadable content takes the form of in-app purchases in the Lucyd companion app, allowing our ecosystem to initially function on existing smartphone platforms. •   LCD enables instant, vocally-initiated P2P transfers among the Lucyd community. •   LCD can be natively integrated into Lucyd apps, allowing for instant in-app purchases and participation rewards without requiring signup or a bank account. E.g., a game that integrates your LCD wallet for its currency, rewarding achievements and selling gem packs in LCD.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Absolutely not! Please follow the bonus structure that varies depending on the amount of contribution:  https://www.lucyd.co/token/

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Lucyd will seek to generate revenue from these sources, and this is what makes this project so big:  1. Sales of smartglasses 2. Sales of apps 3. Licensing our proprietary technology to third party manufacturers. 4. Collecting network fees on transfers and purchases using the LCD token.  We view the market for Lucyd lens glasses and apps to be global and map onto the current market for smartphone sales led by China, Emerging APCA, U.S., and Middle-East & Africa.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hello, the LCD token is intended to empower our decentralized AR app ecosystem, which enables app developers to earn LCD based on community feedback. Also, users will earn LCD by engaging with and reviewing content. LCD can be integrated in AR apps and allows per to peer transfer in AR space. Finally, you can buy smartglasses, apps and media from Lucyd store with LCD. Lot of benefits huh?

Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hello, one of the coolest features of Lucyd is that you can fit the corrective lenses in our smartglasses, which will be designed for comfortable and extended use. Our goal is to have Lucyd Lens seamlessly support your daily life with useful information, and make it easier to access the Internet and your favorite apps. The novel Lucyd Lens interface will automatically adjust to fit the task at hand, based on the app you are using, so your eyes are on the real world when they need to be, and on AR objects when it’s appropriate. Lucyd will be there when you need it, and out of the way in the blink of an eye when you don’t. We believe this is what’s required for AR to go mainstream, and this is what we’re seeking to build.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Yes! we have been attending a lot of meetups and conferences. So far we've attended Blockchain Expo North America, Cryptocurrency World Expo, LATAM Bitcoin & Blockchain Conference, CoinAgenda Summit, World Crypto Economic Forum, The North American Bitocin Conference, Blockchain Week London, ICO London & Amsterdam, D10e Cayman Islands and The Blockchain Event

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Yes, anyone familiar with the space appreciates the value of the technology we have on had.  Just to clarify - it's AR, not VR! We focus on AR, we think it's going to be the biggest market:  https://www.lucyd.co/2017/12/22/drkostoulas/  According to Digi-Capital’s Augmented/Virtual Reality Report 2017, both technologies are expected to be a $108 billion market by 2021, with augmented reality accounting for $83 billion of the total.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Yeah, you can see links to public profiles of our team at: https://www.lucyd.co/about-us/  The scientific review of our tech can be found at:  https://www.lucyd.co/2017/12/22/drkostoulas/  and  https://www.lucyd.co/2017/10/31/scientific-analysis-of-lucyd-patents-by-lucyd-optics-lead-dr-kayat/

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: By having a decentralized app store that runs on our token, we can automatically reward developers for content based on community ratings, enable P2P transactions in AR, and eventually we want to implement a hardware wallet into the Lens. This will let you store and access crypto in as single device.  A decentralized content ecosystem can grow much faster, because developers aren't required to wait for approval and pay large fees like in conventional marketplaces. Instead, control is democratized, and the community chooses which content should be promoted and which should be removed from the platform.  Essentially, developers mine our token by getting positive user ratings on our content, and users can mine it for actions like watching ads, and both can spend it on new AR content and hardware, or swap it for other cryptos.  Well we think by creating a community-regulated developer environment, it can grow much faster. Serious devs with tons of content will be able to supply the network with processing power too.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Helping folks with disabilities is what keeps me personally so driven with this company. Real time speech recognition in glasses can help for example people with hearing disabilities.  Imagine: you can't hear me, but your smartglasses can and they can display what I am saying in front of your eyes in real time. How amazing this one application is?  And that's just one example!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Fortunately, not all is binary and a direct function of $ resources in the startup and tech world. Our technology is proprietary and protected so that nobody else than Lucyd can use it. The underlying free form optics technology patented is only available to Lucyd, and it's unlikely (although possible) that a competitor will come out with something incorporating all the features our tech enables. Even if this happens, the AR is going to be so big, there will be space for more than one player!  Our tech has a number of first ever features, please see them at:  https://www.lucyd.co/technology/

Help them find their way into society's playground, making them confident into what they do.  And more over helping people with their jobs to maximize man hours and minimize failure.  Concluding into a more productive industry.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hey guys,  Lucyd is getting amazing mainstream media press lately. Our PR efforts have been paying off and are reflected in an accelerated pace of purchases as well!  We are on the front page of Disruptor Daily, top tech disruption website out there: https://www.disruptordaily.com/lucyd-startup-building-future-wearable-ar/  What are the top three tech trends you're seeing in AR?  #Tech Trend 1: We believe that AR will become more widely adopted once a smartglass can fit the form of standard spectacles. Eyeglasses were first introduced in 1290, in Pisa, Italy. For more than 700 years, people have embraced the current eyeglass design motif to correct their vision and as a fashion accessory. Due to its nature as a facial wearable, smartglasses need to be lightweight and highly customizable, both features that Lucyd technology enables.  #Tech Trend 2: Increasing enhanced field of view (EFV), the AR-supported scope, to be able to support all or most of the user’s natural visual field. For smartglasses to go mainstream, first and foremost, they must be good glasses available in a wide variety of frame styles. Smartglasses are not a traditional consumer electronics product like a wearable exercise monitor or a smartwatch, but rather an evolutionary leap in current eyeglasses. This is necessary for intelligent positioning of real and virtual objects in the visual field.  #Tech Trend 3: Hands free control of smartglasses with microphones and bone conducting speakers to leverage artificial intelligence tools like Siri, Google Voice and Alexa.

Author: TyrellWellick
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Enhanced user power through Augmented Reality makes life more convenient and productive while mobile. Unlike other existing augmented reality products. This project offers us to have to do more while having less, surpassing bulky and unwanted-attention-drawing products nowadays. Making a more efficient and convenient platform for both professional and entertainment's sake. Offering the AR Community a more advanced approach, able to handle complex applications while giving concern as well to our physiological state, having high caliber individuals putting together team effort plus a mind blowing idea. These next generation smartglasses will take over the market. It's smart for Lucyd to support the handsfree computing community; because as what we can obviously foresee. AR is the future.

Author: TyrellWellick
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Yes, ideally futuristic figures play on AR's potential, last year I attended a Developer's Convention held at Davao City. Augmented reality was one of the hot topic discussed by the lecturers. Potentially if Lucyd really pull this off. This will be huge, because as what we can see. AR indeed is the future.  I just read the whitepaper and I was amazed by how you guys putting effort and energy to this project. If I have some eth now I'd invest in this project.  As an IT student; I find this project surreal.  Damn, AR's hot. Good luck Lucyd. I hope you take over the market soon!  Hands free computing community would be so proud.  All the best!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: It's absolutely the future. AR is a natural next step in how humans process digital information. The next natural step is for digital information to interact naturally with real objects in real life!  This article talks great deal about future of AR: https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/whats-the-future-of-augmented-reality_us_5a5a7ccae4b01ccdd48b5cfb  "Imagine someone telling you that in less than ten years you won’t own a smartphone. It’s a hard pill to swallow considering the unprecedented adoption of smartphones since their debut in the mid 90s.  While smartphones have experienced a meteoric rise over the last couple decades, there is always bigger and better. In this case, ‘bigger and better’ is smaller, faster, and fits right over your eyes. We’re talking about augmented reality (AR) smart glasses"

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Our goal is to develop the prototype of world's first ergonomic, light weight and comfortable smartglasses. What smartglasses and AR do: they superimpose computer graphics and text on top of your natural vision to let you perform daily tasks and computing functions in an easy, comfortable way and seamlessly intergrated with real world.  We want to put your favorite apps in front of you, whether it's shopping, navigation, gaming. There is so many different applications:  http://www.newsbtc.com/2017/12/18/potential-applications-lucyds-blockchain-fueled-smartglasses/

Author: yyz13857180757

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hey it's actually AR! VR focuses 100% on simulated reality only, while AR actually superimposes digital information on top of your natural vision and it interacts with it.  VR is a great market, but we think AR is going to be much bigger thanks to much broader spectrum of daily uses applications.  We are moving fast to develop the prototype of an ergonomic hardware, so that the AR app ecosystem can grow using blockchain. We already signed 6 alliances with some leading AR software developers to have some apps ready when the prototype comes out, but blockchain will be needed to expedite the pace of the content creation for the app universe that will be needed.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Of course we can! We have exclusively licenses a powerful portfolio of 13 AR/optics patents that teach how to build an ergonomic, light-weight, comfortable pair of AR smarglasses. We have hired 7Ph.D.s and some of the top advanced optics and AR scientists in the U.S. We have performed rigorous scientific analysis of the technology to make sure it works. The first pre-prototype was already put in place, and we are commencing the design work later this month. Further we will engage electro optical engineering firm and industrial design firm to manufacture the prototype over next 12 months.

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: No, our patents include optics technology that leads to miniaturization of optics elements needed to produce a light weight, compact pair of smartglasses.  This is well documented here: https://www.lucyd.co/technology/

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Already signed 6 strategic alliances with leading AR software developers!  Then we will use blockchain to further expedite the growth by opening up the platform to developers and letting them keep more traditional app/media revenue + LCD mining for best reviewed apps.

Author: Alexbt
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: WHY YOU DON’T OWN SMARTGLASSES YET  here are a number of reasons why smartglasses have yet to go mainstream. Clunky form factors, eye-straining monocular displays, poor processing power and resolution, and difficult-to-master controls are just a few of the issues holding back AR devices. Additionally, a Forbes article suggests that marketing problems could also be interrupting progress. Just what problem do smartglasses address? Why do I need it? These are questions that must be answered for the public to adopt AR with the same candor as the smartphone revolution. Lucyd is addressing all of these issues with its unique technology advantage.  Fortunately, Lucyd is addressing both the technology and marketing fronts of AR. On the technology side, our smartglasses are built on a portfolio of 13 symbiotic patents from the renowned College of Optics and Photonics at the University of Central Florida. These patents were invented largely by Dr. Jannick Rolland, a Lucyd advisor and a world-class optical engineer. Years of dedicated research went into Lucyd patents, and it shows in their incredible potential. Lucyd Lens smartglasses will fix many of the major problems in today’s AR displays. They have flush microdisplays instead of external AR units, they accommodate prescription lenses, auto-adjust to lighting conditions, have multiple control methods, and harness the processing power and data signal of the user’s smartphone. It all adds up to the first sleek, unibody smartglasses that look and feel just like regular spectacles. Except Lucyd Lens will change how you see the world.  We are also presenting Lucyd in a way that shows all of AR’s potential to the public. The truly handsfree computing offered by Lucyd Lens will drastically improve the way we do many personal and professional tasks. Imagine voice-navigated internet browsing, eye-controlled apps, a heads-up car dashboard and GPS, visually enhanced surroundings, instant communication, and seamless connectivity with the Internet of Things–all in a single device. Smartglasses are not just going to be a necessary device for the connected individual, they are going to evolve human sight itself. If any bit of information is missing from your real world experience, Lucyd Lens can fill that void with relevant information. This is all while allowing the user to be more comfortable and aware than when completing similar tasks on a smartphone. Once you have the cloud right before your eyes, in a pleasing, hi-res interface, you will get the Lucyd dream.  https://medium.com/@hgross_74590/why-you-dont-own-smartglasses-yet-fdb52393f550

Body: Yes we are an AR startup, we are doing an ICO to both crowdfund our prototype development, as well as begin our AR blockchain with the LCD token.  Several years of well-funded research at UCF went into our 13 AR patents, which we have exclusively licensed from the university to build next-gen smartglasses. The lead inventor of those patents, Dr. Jannick Rolland, is on the Lucyd team. But the purpose of our ICO is to get the funds needed to complete our first prototype.  We are planning a worldwide launch through our site, with 500 beta pairs releasing first to ICO participants early 2019. The wide release will be later in 2019.

But consider they can be your go-to device as well as replace your ordinary glasses, we think there will be sufficient interest even at a high price point.

Author: Ankorus-one
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Smart glasses are quite a compact device. How do you plan to solve the problem of power consumption and battery capacity?

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hello, the Lens will use your smartphone/tablet for the majority of its computing power. Your phone will render a complete AR audiovisual signal and transmit it to the Lens for display via bluetooth. Our freeform optics technology uses less power than other methods as well.  Furthermore, you will be able to instantly engage and disengage the AR display as needed with a vocal command. This ensures the device is only using power when needed.  Wireless charging mats will provide more opportunities for easy, rapid charging.  As the device progress, batteries will become more efficient, increasing power capacity over time.  I hope this helps!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: The wireless charging mat would supply power to the Lens. All data will be exchanged via Bluetooth. We're still in development, so exact specs for things like the battery are not yet available.  Thanks for the kind words!

Author: Lucyd
Title: [ANN] Lucyd - Welcome to Lucyd, the new Augmented Reality World
Body: Hey guys I just wanted to share a very nice review from a person who met us in Santa Clara conference earlier in December. It shows exactly why our project is so valuable:   ICO_hunter01 december 2017, 19:53 "I met someone from Lucyd at the Blockchain Expo in Santa Clara this week. There aren’t a lot of product ICOs, so Lucyd stands out that way by making AR smart glasses with apps on blockchain. And I agree with the expert review that this type of tech is a risk, but everything in this space and investments in general all have embedded risk. What’s promising here is that if you read their patents (there’s 13!) and see how they apply the first in class features to lightweight glasses it has the potential to upend big players like oculus rift and Microsoft’s hololens which remind me of the first mobile phones: giant and clunky. Look at the team they’ve assembled too which include the inventor who runs the National Science Foundation Center for Freeform Optics, the guy from Amazon’s Computer Vision Group, the director of USC’s Vision and graphic lab plus 5 other PhD’s. They have a good shot at making this reality and obviously by the looks of it this token sale will accelerate development. "
